statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND updated_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 OR price > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND updated_at < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC, updated_at ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY id ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE id = 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity * price AS total_price FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price <= 50 AND quantity >= 5 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Orders ON Inventory.id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date, product_name FROM Orders INNER JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.id WHERE Orders.quantity >= 2 AND Inventory.price > 20 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, o.order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY o.order_date ASC

SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.customer_name FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY p.product_name
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id WHERE order_items.quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 AND order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, i.product_name, i.price, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN inventory i ON oi.product_id = i.product_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5 ORDER BY o.order_id ASC, oi.quantity DESC;
